attributes.action: start school half an hour late when clocks go forward in Spring and half an hour early when clocks go back in Autumn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Starting school late or early, depending on what time it is in the year, after the clocks go forward or back would probably help with tiredness. It'd also balance out in the long term with the half an hour added then taken away.
